headingOne: Hi There, It's Abhishek Waghre. — Building fast, secure, and scalable web apps — with purpose and precision. Delightfully Interactive Frontends That Actually Make Users Say 'Whoa'.
mainPara: I believe in writing clean, maintainable code, staying curious, and building products that truly serve users. Whether working independently or collaborating with a team, I bring creativity, energy, and pixel-perfect precision to every project I touch.
